Course Name: ACG 3171 - ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRESENT
Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE: ACG 2021 WITH A GRADE OF "C" OR BETTER.
Course Description: ANALYSIS OF THE ASSUMPTIONS AND PROCEDURES UNDERLYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE IMPACT OF ACCOUNTING POLICIES ON THE USE OF THE FINANCIAL DISCLOSURES MADE BY BUSINESS ENTERPRISES. CREDIT NOT ALLOWED FOR ACCOUNTING MAJORS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
